mapper.select: SELECT id, banner, title, info, pic, cost, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime, CASE 1 WHEN NOW() > end_time THEN '已结束' WHEN NOW() < start_time THEN '未开始' WHEN NOW() > start_time && NOW() < end_time THEN '进行中' ELSE '无效' END AS actStatus, address, sponsor_logo as sponsorLogo, sponsor_name as sponsorName, sponsor_wx as sponsorWx, create_by as createBy, create_time as createTime, del_flag as delFlag, browse_amount as browseAmount, (SELECT count(1) from act_activity_guest_login where act_activity_guest_login.act_id=act_activity.id) as browseVisit FROM act_activity WHERE del_flag = '0' group by id ORDER BY FIELD(actStatus,'进行中','未开始','已结束','无效'),create_time DESC

SELECT id, banner, title, info, pic, cost, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS startTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime, CASE 1 WHEN NOW() < start_time THEN '未开始' WHEN NOW() > start_time && NOW() < end_time THEN '进行中' ELSE '无效' END AS actStatus, address, sponsor_logo as sponsorLogo, sponsor_name as sponsorName, sponsor_wx as sponsorWx, create_by as createBy, create_time as createTime, del_flag as delFlag, browse_amount as browseAmount, (SELECT count(1) from act_activity_guest_login where act_activity_guest_login.act_id=act_activity.id) as browseVisit FROM act_activity WHERE del_flag = '0' AND ((NOW() < start_time) or (NOW() > start_time && NOW() < end_time)) group by id ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT (SELECT count(1) from act_activity_register where activity_id=#{id}) as registerNo, (SELECT count(1) from act_activity_register ar,act_activity_vote av where ar.register_id=av.register_id and ar.activity_id=#{id}) as voterNo, (SELECT count(1) from act_activity_guest_login where act_id=#{id}) as visitNo, (SELECT count(1) from activity_statistics where activity_id=#{id} and type='2') as likeNo, (SELECT count(1) from activity_statistics where activity_id=#{id} and type='3') as collectNo
